summary: Dr. Panayiotis A. Baltatzis, M.D. had his medical license revoked for unprofessional conduct, specifically for failing to comply with a 2015 Consent Order that required him to permanently close his practice in May 2017. Despite the order, he continued to see and treat patients and write prescriptions, which constituted the practice of medicine. This violation followed a lengthy history of prior disciplinary actions for pervasive standard of care and recordkeeping deficiencies.
